name: Super Mario on Scratch - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch - HTML Port
description:
This is the first Super Mario on Scratch game that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/378962909/

Credits -

Flughand - Feblu

Nintendo for Mario, sounds/music, and the Super Mario logo. 

Me for most of the art.
